Ingredient: 12 cl beer|12 cl Pineapple juice|3 cl strawberry syrup
Step: In a beer glass, add a dash of strawberry syrup.Complete with beer, tipping the glass to avoid excessive foaming, and then pour the pineapple juice.Drink very fresh.

Title: Black Velvet
Ingredient: 12 cl stout|12 cl champagne
Step: Pour the stout and champain together in a class, being careful to ensure there is no overspill.

Title: Champagne Soup (cocktail)
Ingredient: 8 cl cointreau|16 cl cane sugar|2  lime|1 ice cube|75 cl champagne
Step: Pour into a container Cointreau, cane sugar and lemon juice.Soak overnight.Add the Champagne before serving with ice.

Title: Cuba Libre
Ingredient: 6 cl white rum|1/2 lime|15 cl coca-cola
Step: Squeeze the juice of half a lime into a collins glass.Add ice cubes.Add cola.Stir well.

Title: Tutti Cocktail
Ingredient: 2 cl strawberry syrup|2 cl peach syrup|4 cl vodka|4 cl apple|5  ice cubes
Step: Mix in a shaker and add ice.For a small effect, to the strawberry syrup after mixing.

Title: Pina Colada
Ingredient: 4 cl white rum|2 cl amber rum|12 cl pineapple juice|4 cl coconut milk|1 cup crushed ice
Step: Pour rum, cream of coconut and pineapple juice into a blender with one cup of crushed iceBlend until smooth

Title: Strawberry Margarita
Ingredient: broken ice|2 lime|1 strawberry|20 cl tequila|12 cl cointreau|2 tsp sugar
Step: Wash and hull strawberries. Put ice cubes in a food processor and mix with strawberries.Squeeze the limes. Put the tequila, Cointreau and lemon juice in a measuring with 2 tablespoons sugar.Mix and pour into a blender with crushed ice and strawberries.Decorate glasses of sugar (wet glasses in lemon juice and then dip them in sugar).Divide cocktail in glasses and health!

Title: Pink Cocktail Pink Grapefruit
Ingredient: 75 cl blush wine|30 cl grapefruit juice|5 cl grenadine
Step: In a large pitcher, pour the grenadine syrup and rose wine and grapefruit juice.Serve chilled.

Title: Bacardi Cocktail, Grenadine, Lemon
Ingredient: 24 cl rum|6 cl Grenadine syrup|12 cl lemon juice
Step: Put the grenadine syrup, lemon juice and Bacardi in a shaker.Strongly shake.Pour into glasses and serve immediately.

Title: MTS Cocktail
Ingredient: 50 cl martini|25 cl triple sec|25 cl cane sugar syrup|50 cl multivitamin juice
Step: In a large pitcher, combine all ingredients and mix. Let stand one hour in the refrigerator.A taste very fresh.

Title: Madras Cocktail
Ingredient: 40 cl Orange juice|20 cl white wine|5 cl Grenadine
Step: Mix orange juice with white wine.Pour into glasses. Add a dash of grenadine.
